definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: When I am 50, I want to have a happy family like Angie.
sentences.chinese: 當我五十歲的時候，希望能像趙雅芝一樣幸福美滿。

sentences.english: Lotus Fairy Lake in cross-strait people live under the care of a happy and peaceful life.
sentences.chinese: 湖兩岸百姓在蓮花仙子的呵護下過着美滿祥和的生活。

sentences.english: And seems well on her way to having a dream family with perfect teeth and no body odor.
sentences.chinese: 她看起來似乎有美滿的家庭，牙齒健康，沒有體臭。

sentences.english: I'm sure they'll be very happy and grow old together.
sentences.chinese: 他們肯定會幸福美滿，白頭偕老。

sentences.english: The end is still unhappy. Out of sight, out of mind, I say.
sentences.chinese: 結局仍然很不美滿，我說眼不見心不亂。

sentences.english: He is married and owns a fine home and the most extensive private library in the State.
sentences.chinese: 他已結婚，家庭美滿，並擁有州里最大的私人藏書室。

sentences.english: Whenas I wish you both a lifetime of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 然而我還是祝願妳們白頭到老，幸福美滿。

sentences.english: The round moon, placing people how happy living the dream.
sentences.chinese: 圓圓的月亮，寄託着人們多少美滿生活的夢想。

sentences.english: Carrie in quantity does not accord with the ordered, happy happy to pursue.
sentences.chinese: 嘉麗因收畫的數量與訂購的不符，到美滿追究。

sentences.english: The foundation for raising up a strong new generation is to manage a happy marriage.
sentences.chinese: 興起剛強的新世代之基礎，在於經營一個美滿的婚姻。

sentences.english: They have a lovely family with three children.
sentences.chinese: 他們家庭美滿，育有一子二女。

sentences.english: With these, a marriage can survive and thrive, even in an election year.
sentences.chinese: 有了這些基礎，即使在大選之年，婚姻也能幸福美滿。

sentences.english: Prefer to abandon their own, and to give other people a happy life.
sentences.chinese: 寧願拋棄自己，而給予別人的一個幸福美滿的生活。

sentences.english: Happy love, so that the tension of the fighter relaxed down.
sentences.chinese: 美滿的愛情，使鬥士緊繃的心情鬆弛下來。

sentences.english: Mr. Richard, is the sweetness of existence.
sentences.chinese: 理查先生，一個知足的人生活才能美滿。

definition: everything is going smoothly/just as one wishes
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
Anle district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
good karma/opportune connection with marriage partner
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
to be successful in business/professional success
to treat each other as an honored guest (idiom)/mutual respect between husband and wife
propitious wind throughout the journey (idiom)/plain sailing/to go smoothly/have a nice trip!
